snippet.title: Where's My Water -- Celebrating Over 300 Levels!
snippet.description:
Where's My Water - Celebrating Over 300 Levels!

Over 300 levels are now available in Where's My Water from Disney!  Get started in Swampy's story and for an extra challenge try Cranky's Story now featuring over 80 levels for a small additional price.

So much fun, and it's always getting bigger.

Where's My Water is Disney's hit app, and is available for $0.99 on the iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch on the App store: http://ow.ly/aXTs6

Also available for $0.99 in Android Market! http://ow.ly/aXTtn

Have you "Tri-Ducked" the game yet and completed all the bonus levels? Let us know at http://www.facebook.com/WheresMyWater

Where's My Water? is a challenging physics-based puzzler complete with Retina display graphics, Multi-Touch controls, and a sensational soundtrack. To be successful, you need to be clever and keep an eye out for algae, toxic ooze, triggers, and traps. 

The critics love Swampy too! 

"Editor's Choice Award" — IGN 
"Game of the Month" — SLIDE TO PLAY 
"One of the best in the App Store..." — APPLE 'N' APPS 
"One of those rare gems that manages to get everything right." — GAMEZEBO 
"This is the perfect game to play on the go." — KIDZWORLD 
"Your family will be fighting over who gets to play it next." — APPADVICE 

TAGS:
disney apps disney app disney iphone ipad ipod touch google play android kindle amazon nook where's my water meet swampy official trailer itunes iphone ipad ipod iphone game ipad game ipod touch game physics puzzler game  rubber duckies 300 levels makers of JellyCar original soundtrack swampy's shower official swampy's search trailer cranky
